00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include "fault.h"
00023 using namespace std;

00028 bool Read_Faults_Into_FaultSet(string fname, Circuit& circuit,FaultSet& set)
00029 {
00030     ifstream faultsFile;
00031     
00032     faultsFile.open(fname.c_str(),ios::in);
00033     // Read faults from the faults.txt file
00034     if (!faultsFile.good())
00035     {
00036         cout << "Couldn't open the file " << fname << endl;
00037         exit(-1);
00038     }
00039     
00040     string wireName;
00041     int faultType;
00042     map<string,Wire *>::iterator iter;
00043 
00044     while (faultsFile >> wireName >> faultType)
00045     {
00046         
00047         cout << "Fault specified: Wire: " << wireName << " FaultValue " << faultType << endl;
00048         if ( ((iter = circuit.Netlist.find(wireName)) !=  circuit.Netlist.end()) &&  (faultType == 0 || faultType == 1))
00049         {
00050             Fault readFault(iter->second, (faultType==0)?0:1);
00051             set.push_back(readFault);
00052         }
00053         else
00054         {
00055             cout << "Fault specified in " << fname << " incorrect - wire not found or faultvalue incorrect" << endl; 
00056             exit(-1);
00057         }
00058     }
00059 
00060     faultsFile.close();
00061     return true;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void Print_FaultSet(FaultSet set)
00065 {
00066     list<Fault>::iterator iter;
00067     cout << "Printing the set of faults " << endl; 
00068     cout << "Wire name \t" << "Fault Type \t" << "Detected" << endl;
00069     for (iter = set.begin(); iter != set.end(); iter++)
00070     { 
00071         cout << ((*iter).FaultSite)->id << "\t" << (*iter).faultType << "\t" << (*iter).detected << endl; 
00072     }
00073     cout << endl;
00074     return;
00075 }
